high_descs: turn left, take a few steps, turn right to face bed
pick up magazine that was on the bed
turn right, walk forward, turn left after the bed, walk forward to small table
put magazine on to small table
anns.task_desc: move a magazine from the bed to the table

high_descs: go to left end of bed
pick up book on left, front corner of bed
go to empty bedside table to the right of bed
anns.task_desc: Place book on right bedside table

high_descs: Turn left and go to the bottom left edge of the bed
Pick up the game that is on the bottom left edge of the bed
Go right and around the bed to the bedside table
Put the game on top of the table
anns.task_desc: Move a game from the bed to the bedside table
